Incode - Hamming Sim

Website:https://incode.avrami.me

Incode is an education-centric project born out of a subject I took during my second semester at RMIT.

While researching a form of error correction, known as a ‘Hamming Code’, I was unable to find any sites which made the calculation of the error correction code easy to understand. I took it upon myself to build a site that took students through the calculation step by step.

The project is built using a React/MaterialUI frontend plus a Flask backend (As the calculation code was submitted as an assignment It can’t be served to the client).

This project involved learning the following

  • Javascript (React)
  • Python (Flask)
  • User Experience/Design (Material Design)
  • Education Design
